SELECT t1.id, t1.form_id, t1.data_id, t1.operate, t1.commit_by, t1.commit_time, t2.nick_name FROM (SELECT * FROM data_fill_commit_log WHERE form_id = #{formId} ) t1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT username, nick_name FROM sys_user) t2 ON t1.commit_by = t2.username
AND t2.nick_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{commitByName},'%')
ORDER BY t1.commit_time DESC

SELECT
FROM data_fill_task WHERE status = 1 AND ((rate_type = -1 AND publish_start_time <= current_timestamp AND (publish_end_time is null OR publish_end_time >= current_timestamp)) OR (rate_type != -1 AND start_time <= current_timestamp AND (end_time is null OR end_time >= current_timestamp)) )

SELECT t1.id, t1.task_id, t1.form_id, t1.value_id, t1.`user`, t1.start_time, t1.end_time, t1.finish_time, t2.`name` AS formName, t3.`name` AS taskName, t3.`creator`, t4.`nick_name` AS creatorName FROM (SELECT
FROM data_fill_user_task WHERE user = #{userId} AND finish_time IS NULL AND start_time <= #{current} AND (end_time IS NULL OR end_time >= #{current})) t1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT id, `name` FROM data_fill_form) t2 ON t1.form_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT id, `name`, `creator` FROM data_fill_task) t3 ON t1.task_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT user_id, nick_name FROM sys_user) t4 ON t3.creator = t4.user_id
AND t3.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{taskName},'%')
ORDER BY t1.end_time, t1.start_time

SELECT t1.id, t1.task_id, t1.form_id, t1.value_id, t1.`user`, t1.start_time, t1.end_time, t1.finish_time, t2.`name` AS formName, t3.`name` AS taskName, t3.`creator`, t4.`nick_name` AS creatorName FROM (SELECT
FROM data_fill_user_task WHERE user = #{userId} AND finish_time IS NOT NULL AND (end_time IS NULL OR end_time >= #{current})) t1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT id, `name` FROM data_fill_form) t2 ON t1.form_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT id, `name`, `creator` FROM data_fill_task) t3 ON t1.task_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT user_id, nick_name FROM sys_user) t4 ON t3.creator = t4.user_id
AND t3.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{taskName},'%')
ORDER BY t1.finish_time DESC, t1.end_time DESC, t1.start_time

FROM data_fill_user_task WHERE user = #{userId} AND end_time <= #{current}) t1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT id, `name` FROM data_fill_form) t2 ON t1.form_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT id, `name`, `creator` FROM data_fill_task) t3 ON t1.task_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT user_id, nick_name FROM sys_user) t4 ON t3.creator = t4.user_id
AND t3.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{taskName},'%')
